channel.title: 双酚A on 老刘博客
channel.description: Recent content in 双酚A on 老刘博客

item.title: 除了塑料奶瓶，还有那些对致癌物
item.author: ewader@qq.com (老刘)
item.description:
1、装修少用人造板

<p style="BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 0px; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; FONT-SIZE: 14px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN: 15px 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px; PADDING-TOP: 0px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px">
  5、<span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span"><strong>少去地下车库</strong></span></span>
</p>

<p style="BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 0px; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; FONT-SIZE: 14px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN: 15px 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px; PADDING-TOP: 0px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px">
  <span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span"><strong><span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span">工业废气、汽车尾气、烟草烟雾、柏油路面受热后</span></span></strong></span></span>
</p>

<p style="BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 0px; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; FONT-SIZE: 14px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN: 15px 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px; PADDING-TOP: 0px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px">
  挥发出的气体，以及一些化学清洁剂等中都有毒性，有的甚至致癌。因此，父母首先要避免让孩子吸”二手烟”；其次要尽量避开汽车尾气浓度高的地方，比如别在地下车库长时间停留。
</p>

<p style="BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-RIGHT: 0px; PADDING-LEFT: 0px; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; FONT-SIZE: 14px; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0px; MARGIN: 15px 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px; PADDING-TOP: 0px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px">
  <span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span"><strong><span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span">6、<span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span"><strong>新衣服晒三天再穿 <br /><span style="WORD-SPACING: 0px; FONT: medium Simsun; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WHITE-SPACE: normal; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; orphans: 2; widows: 2; webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px; webkit-border-vertical-spacing: 0px; webkit-text-decorations-in-effect: none; webkit-text-size-adjust: auto; webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px" class="Apple-style-span"><span style="FONT-SIZE: 14px; LINE-HEIGHT: 23px" class="Apple-style-span">童装的问题主要集中在甲醛超标、pH值不合格上。因此，挑童装，别买做过抗皱和漂白处理的，以素色和没有印花图案的为宜，且图案印花不能太硬。买时先闻一下，若有类似家具城里的刺鼻气味就别买。新衣服买回后，要用清水浸泡10分钟，充分漂洗后再挂到太阳下晾晒3天。</span></span></strong></span></span></span></span></strong></span></span>
</p>
